data.name: ErrorAttributeNotFound
data.value: The LDAP attribute "{0}" was not found while assigning properties.

data.name: ErrorCertificateExpired
data.value: The LDAP SSL certificate is not valid after {0}.

data.name: ErrorCertificateNotYetValid
data.value: The LDAP SSL certificate is not valid before {0}.

data.name: ErrorCertIssuerMismatch
data.value: The LDAP SSL certificate has not been issued by "{0}", but by "{1}".

data.name: ErrorCertThumbprintMismatch
data.value: The LDAP SSL certificate has the thumbprint "{0}", which is not one of the expected ones.

data.name: ErrorEmptyPassword
data.value: The password for the LDAP service account must be specified if a service user is configured.

data.name: ErrorEmptySearchBase
data.value: The search base must be a non-empty string.

data.name: ErrorEntryNotFound
data.value: An entry with a value of "{1}" for "{0}" does not exist in the directory.

data.name: ErrorGroupClaim
data.value: Could not retrieve group claim for "{0}".

data.name: ErrorGroupNotFound
data.value: The group with identity "{group}" was not found in the directory.

data.name: ErrorInvalidSid
data.value: The given byte sequence "{0}" does not represent a valid security identifier.

data.name: ErrorLdapOptionsRegistration
data.value: The default LdapOptions cannot be registered as interface, because this would result in an ambiguous constructor call. Use the non-generic variant of AddLdapOptions to register the default options type.

data.name: ErrorLdapPage
data.value: Paging of LDAP search results must start at 0.

data.name: ErrorLdapPageSize
data.value: The size of a page of LDAP search results must be at least 1.

data.name: ErrorNoIdentity
data.value: The type {0} is not annotated with a unique LdapIdentity attribute.

data.name: ErrorNoLdapAttribute
data.value: The property {0} is not annotated with an LdapAttribute attribute.

data.name: ErrorPrimaryGroupClaim
data.value: Could not retrieve the primary group claim for "{0}".

data.name: ErrorPropertyNotFound
data.value: The given property "{0}" was not found.

data.name: ErrorPropertyNotMapped
data.value: The given property "{0}" has no LDAP attribute mapped for the current schema "{1}".

data.name: ErrorUserNotFound
data.value: Login succeeded, but user information for "{0}" could not be found.

data.name: InfoBindCurrent
data.value: Bind using the current credentials.

data.name: InfoBindingAsUser
data.value: Performing LDAP bind as user "{0}".

data.name: InfoBoundAsUser
data.value: Authenticated successfully as user "{0}".

data.name: InfoBoundCurrent
data.value: Bound using the current credentials.

data.name: InfoCheckCertIssuer
data.value: Checking for LDAP server certificate "{0}" being issued by "{1}".

data.name: InfoCheckCertThumbprint
data.value: Checking that LDAP server "certificate {0} has one of the following thumbprints: {1}

data.name: InfoConnectingLdap
data.value: Connecting to LDAP server {0}:{1}.

data.name: WarnCertCheckDisabled
data.value: LDAP SSL certificate check has been disabled.

data.name: WarnNoSsl
data.value: SSL is most likely not working due to https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/43890.
